Peregrine falcon can achieve speeds over: Peregrine falcon top speed Can peregrine falcons fly over 386 mph

Some sources state that it can reach over 320 km/h (200 mph) during its characteristic hunting stoop (high-speed dive), which would make it the fastest animal on the planet, but, according to a National Geographic TV program, the highest measured speed of a peregrine falcon is 389 km/h (242 mph).
Peregrine falcon top speed Can peregrine falcons fly over 386 mph

Peregrine Falcon – Top Speed: 240 mph (386 kph) The peregrine falcon holds the title of the fastest animal in the world. During its hunting stoop (high-speed dive), it ascends to great heights before plummeting toward its prey at speeds that can exceed 240 mph (386 kph).
